snippet.title: A Weekend in Puzzleburg - "Scenes Around Puzzleburg" trailer
snippet.description:
Try the free demo and wishlist "A Weekend in Puzzleburg" on Steam here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1929760/A_Weekend_in_Puzzleburg

"A Weekend in Puzzleburg" is a cozy slice-of-life RPG/puzzle game where you explore a quiet resort town and puzzle out how to help each resident with something they need.  That may be as simple as finding an apple somewhere in town or it may be something a bit more complicated. Or spend some time reading a book, getting your hair dyed, or just simply checking out the town. Whatever the case, there's no rush, so enjoy a relaxing weekend in Puzzleburg.
